content.detailedDescription:
Toke 2 fotos in maybe 5 sek, in the first picture was an object visible, in the second it was not visible.
direction was the o'hare airport.
object first on picture registered.
foto time is april the 16 2016 at 06:25 p.M.
content.summary: Toke 2 fotos in maybe 5 sek, in the first picture was an object visible

content.detailedDescription: While driving to an appointment driving east on state road 38 outside sheridan indiana. i saw a strange sight in the sky. a perfect claer blue sky. no clouds anywhere. a noticed what i can only describe as a small chem trail, not long like i would expect. maybe a few hundred feet long. it was strange cause it looked fresh. by that i mean i expected to see a bright reflection of a plane in front of if. especially on such a bright sunrise sky. also, it wasn't growing like even if i just couldn't see the planes reflection and there was a plane. it would have had to be hovering there. it was like a cigar shaped white chemtrial not growing without a source. it was odd and i observed it for a few minutes until i turned south on state road 31and it was then behind me.It made me wonder what it could be. there was a plane maybe a few miles south of the stance sight but i could clearly see the planes reflection in front of its chemtrail wi h was growing and obviously was a plane leaving a trail in the sky. totally different than the object to the north. i could look at the two and compare.  what i saw was strange, a bright mist the shape of a cigar not moving or growing just there hovering. in my attached photos u must zoom in to see the object. thank u
content.summary: While driving on a perfect clear morning i saw what looked like a small chemtrail. no others were any where. it was small but fresh looking like u see directly behind a plane. only it was not growing. just there and  no plane to be seen near it

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i went out to our back deck for a smoke at about 9:16pm on the evening of april 16th, 2016 in bracebridge, ontario, canada.  we always look up at the sky to watch for moving star-like objects facing approximately 42 degrees ne.  tonight, after about a minute of being outside, we both looked up and saw a large brightly glowing yellow-orange light coming from the east.  it just looked like your average star, but orange in colour and about 10 times the size.  we watched as it slowly and steadily went left across the sky until it was directly in front of us, where it stopped and hovered, unwavering, with a steady glow, for about 2-3 minutes.  then we noticed it had started moving again, but straight forwards and slightly increasing it's elevation.  it must have been traveling at high speeds because it did not take long for the object to gradually fade and then get smaller and smaller until you had to struggle and look off to the side in order to see the tiny speck.  then it was gone.  we finished out smokes and went back inside.  it was about 9:30pm at that point.
content.summary: Bright orang elight gently floated from ne to n, hovered for minutes, took off straight ahead until faded out

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on our way to the food truck fest at tamproom and 19th in south philly.  we drove over there around 5:30 and parked our car on lambert and west porter street where they meet.  after we parked our car, we start walking west on porter and turned left and started walking north on 20th street.  

my wife made a comment about the moon being out over head and i looked up and noticed this object not moving, just hovering.  this was in the broad daylight with not a cloud in the sky.

my wife and i both watched it hover for about 1 minute before it appeared to first come down lower from the sky.  that is why we got excited because it went from hovering to moving downwards slowly.  then it stopped again and we got more excited.  then it changed directions and started moving south east slowly and then it stopped again.

that is when i took out my cell phone and i started recording it.  it stayed stationary for a bit.  the sun was bright and was hitting my cell phone screen and i could not tell if i was actually pointing my camera in the right direction. so i used the moon which was to the right of the object as a reference.  once i saw the moon on my screen. i panned to the left slowly until i saw it appear as a dot on my screen.  

i zoomed out to give you a point of reference and you can see some buildings.  then i zoomed back as much as my cell phone camera could.  i was wanting to watch this with my own eyes but it was hard because i wanted to make sure i was recording it.  the object starting moving east and picking up speed, this is when i put my cell phone down because i had to see this with my own eyes.


as it moved father east, it started moving faster and faster and we could tell this object was large and because of how high it was away from us and how big it looked like from where we were standing.

the object moved so fast they we eventually lost sight of it.  i think we were excited to see one.  this time in the broad daylight.  my wife pulled out her cell phone later tonight and found one other person in philly saw one on the same day and that is how we found it on this website.

i would guess it was about 10,000 to 15,000 feet in the sky but about one mile or less from us.  it defiantly had a shape to it which appeared to look like a "jack" but maybe with four sides and not six.  

my wife drew a picture of the shape of what it looked like to us from our point of view.  i'll attach it here with the video.


my wife watched it mostly with her own eyes as i was recording it.  unfortunately, i wish my cell phone had a better zoom and higher definition.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Reflective, white. hovered. looked like the shape of a cross or star.

content.detailedDescription: Glanced up noticed whie triangular object. made a very strange movement unlike a jet or airplane. sky was blue except for one cloud. went into cloud and never came out. no trace what so ever! waited for minutes and it was gone.  my feelings are that this was not a plane, jet, or anything i have ever seen before.
content.summary: Reading paper, glanced upward noticed object.Made strange movement. disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the library  parking lot adjacent to my apartment in san diego california waiting on a tow truck my new car was acting really  weird the keyless remote was malfunctioning when i press the button to open the locks the lights would come on the fuel door would open everything electric on the car would move, when i tried to start it the battery was dead this is why call the tow truck i spotted the  ufo soon after  the tow truck arrived. i had seen ufos since i was a teenager so the first thing i thought was here is another ufo  the object was moonlight white once it started to move to the west there seem to be a blackness at the very top blacker than black put me in mind of a black hole  i called out to the tow truck driver "hey dude look as i pointed to the sky it's a ufo he look upwards but by the time he looked up the ufo had gone behind a cloud ... three seconds later 2f-16 fighter jets came buzzing pass following the same trajectory as the ufo it passed right by  the ufo but  it was behind the cloud i must also note the cloud that the ufo  was hiding behind was the only cloud in the sky i didn't see the ufo anymore it never came from behind the clouds but it was apparent the f-16s was searching for the craft that i had just observed while the tow truck driver didn't see the ufo  he commented that the hair on his arm was standing up because i had just pointed and motion with my finger the path the ufo had taken when the f-16  almost simultaneously followed a trajectory that mimic the motion i was making with my finger.
 something happened the night before i had watch the movie starman i know that seen the movie before but for some reason it made a heavy impact that time
 while i was in the shower that morning i was singing a song about the star man i don't believe in coincidence i feel in my soul that the two events are connected somehow and i was meant to be in that parking lot that morning because there was no reason for my call to behave the way it did
i  think it's important that i note the mechanics report about my car the battery was completely drained for a unexplainable reason the mechanic said that he'd never seen anything like that with a new battery  and the battery was new the car was new electronically the car has not been the same sense  it would turn off after i would start the car and a countdown would come on the display three minutes and when it reached zero i could start the car again  i believe all these events that i have mentioned are connected and the whole truth and nothing but the truth
that was not the first ufo i witnessed and it certainly wasn't the last 
are we alone? not!
content.summary: Ufo that was whiter than moonlight in glow

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding in a vehicle with my staff driving me to my house on creveling road. we were in the area heading southeast along franklin pike when she and i (my worker and i) witnessed a light in the sky that was bluish and whitish and hovering and pulsating. the light then disappeared after my worker, who was driving the vehicle, after we turned right onto creveling road from franklin pike.

this is in cochranton, pennsylvania. i had no idea what i saw in the sky that night. i just saw what i thought was a ufo. my reaction was that i could not believe what i saw in the sky. the object in the sky just disappeared.

i have no film or video of the object in the sky. i did not have my camera with me at the time. i just saw what appeared to be a light in the sky. i did not see it after i came home down creveling road. i was with my staff at the time i saw the light in the sky. i have no idea if it was a craft or a light reflecting off an object.
content.summary: Creveling road ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: I have been trying to film this white craft i keep seeing. it moves pretty slow, does not look like a plane, but i am not sure. as i ran out trying to film it, with my shaky hands, a gray saucer shaped object went real close to the plane going the opposite direction..It's funny, because i almost felt like that gray object was trying to run interference for the white object, or the other way around. needless to say, i captured neither object and knew i just blew a great chance to film a disk shaped craft, moving fairly slow, mid day and no chemtrails, all blue sky and i blew it. the whole thing was odd. when i saw the gray object it did not really register that it was not a plane, and was disk or saucer shaped. then, i for a few seconds didn't know which one to film.....Dammit, i got faked out and that is exactly what it felt like......Holydiverbronco (youtube)..........I will get the white craft and submit info if in fact is not a plane. as for the gray saucer....Who knows if i will have another shot at it.
content.summary: Saw a white object that i wanted to film. then a gray object went by the opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription: My wife an i were on our way back to city with our 2 childeren sleepin in back .It was sunday nite we had stayed for church an left around 10.Oo pm on a warm summer nite.There were no stars or moon cause it was cloud overcast all weekend. it was a black nite on the country road .We had just turned on the bend of the road to a stright highway about 2 miles long , no cars behind me with one car maybe a mile ahead there r acouple overhead powerlines on that strect of highway. suddenly on the left side of the car i could see the ditch an the trees. there was no light behind us or i would have looked in the rear view mirror first . i looked at my wife to tell her what i could see an she was looking up thro the wind shield towards the roof of the car . i looked up an saw this glowing white florencent ball about 4 feet in diameter an about five feet about the roof of the car. i only saw the front half of the ball shape cause the roof line of the car i could not see  the rest of the object.The car is travelling at 100km per hour an the object was hovering completely still over the roof an no noise. the object looked like it was moving thro  mist or a cloud . no  noise. never felt anything wierd or the car was not efected  either. i looked at the road cause i was driving the car for a second then looked back up again an it was gone. my wife said it went straight up into the black sky. was gonna tell the rcmp but they would not believe us . i know it was not swamp gas . pluto. weather ballon  helicopter. satitite. reflection from venus. or a 727 air liner!
content.summary: Hovered above roof of car about 5 feet from roof

content.detailedDescription: J'était devant mon ordinateur en train de regarder une série quand j'ai remarqué une sorte de lueur entrant par la fenêtre. je ne m'en suis pas soucié car cela ressemblait à un phare de voiture dans la montagne mais quelques secondes plus tard, mon regard fût attiré dehors. c'est alors que j'ai aperçu ce rectangle jaunâtre de façon très brève. je n'ai vu que le contour qui était éclairé. il s'est volatilisé aussi vite qu'il est apparu.
content.summary: Just the outline of a yellow rectangle

content.detailedDescription: I was driving about 1 mile from my home and was on the phone at the time.  there were trees along the road to the right.  i was going up a hill and there is a house at the top of the hill on the right.  just as i cleared the trees (right where the house is), i think i must have seen something in my peripheral vision and looked up above the house and there was a bright silver object hovering over and behind the house.  then there were trees blocking my view again.  i only saw it for a few seconds.  i should have turned around and gone back but i thought maybe when i turned at the bottom of the hill, i would see it above the trees but i didn't.  it was an oblong shape, upright, with a round dome-like top then widened into sort of a lip and then went back in and then there was a longer section on the bottom. it was very shiny like polished chrome and was probably about 20-30 feet long and 12-15 feet wide at its widest point. i was very close to it, probably 200-300 feet. i have never seen anything like it before.  as a matter of fact i have never seen anything that i remotely thought might be a ufo and i am 60 years old. i drove back by there later to see if there was anything that i could have seen that looked like the object and there is nothing there.  no poles with lights, etc, nothing except air.  it could not have been a balloon or inflatable kite because it was completely still.  there was no movement at all.
content.summary: Bright silver oblong object hovered in the sky over and behind a neighborhood house.

content.detailedDescription: Jetais dehors depuis environ 1 heure a regarder la lune dans mon telescope, lorsque ma conjointe sorti de la maison pour aller chercher notre fils au cadet, elle se retournait pour partir vers la voiture , lorsqu'elle me dit :regarde c quoi ça, lumiere tres brillante qui se deplace en ligne doite assez lentement, pendant 3 ou 4 minutes , le temps qu'elle a pris pour traverser le ciel en totalité. la lumiere brillante de la sphere a diminué progressivement jusqua sa disparition totale. je nai pas penser de prendre mon telescope, jetais trop concentré sur cette lumiere bizarre. pendant tout le temps dobservation, aucun bruit ou son de moteur quelquonque! beaucoup de choses bizarre ces temps-ci dans le ciel!
content.summary: Lumiere tres brillante environ de magnitude -1

content.detailedDescription: I live in the denver, co area and was outside eating lunch on my patio around noon when i saw a bright object and a dimmer object move across the sky from the ne to the se. the dimmer object appeared to orbit the brighter object. i thought it may be a passenger jet at first, however it appeared very high and wasn't giving off contrails like jets typically do that fly over the area. the objects moved slow and steady across the sky and appeared blurry and looked like they were reflecting white light from the sun. since i thought they were strange i recorded them for a few minutes. they were very unusual to me, and i've never seen anything like that before.
content.summary: One bright object and another dimmer object that appeared to orbit the other.

content.detailedDescription: Pulling into my driveway i noticed the light breaking through the clouds, and i snapped 2 quick pics because i thought it was odd-looking. i did not see the object with my eyes, it was only when i reviewed my pictures that i noticed the object. so it happened in just a couple of seconds. i probably would have ignored this or chalked it up to a glitch if i had not caught the object clearly moving in the 2 pics. i had stopped my car, so the movement of the object was not due to movement of the camera. i don't believe it was dirt or anything on my lens or window. normally i do not take pics through windows to avoid confusion about unknown specs in the photos. i am often drawn to that same area of sky, and i have previously, and since seen strange movements in the clouds and in the clear night sky of this area of sky. i have come to believe that this is a highly occupied area of sky. there is a private air strip about 3 miles southeast of my home, and a major airport about 15 miles east of my home. commercial airplanes never fly directly over my home, but small engine planes and tons of military helicopters fly directly and low over my home. i should mention that fort jackson is about 45-50 miles southeast of my home. however,i have never seen a military aircraft or any other aircraft at the same time of these sightings or soon afterward.
content.summary: The light coming out of the clouds caught my attention, and i snapped 2 pics. i did not see the object until i reviewed the pics.

content.detailedDescription: This was just a picture taken in my mother home. and i run into finding it in this photo. it looked like a bug to me at first. but with some work i did on the photo i am thinking its a alien. been trying to find other picture of this thing. and info on it. dose other see them? looks green in color and bug like black eyes   something growing out of the head. like antennae. wer some kind of a robe. we all have look it over friends all of us said it looks like a mantis alien!
content.summary: Spoted alien in the home

content.detailedDescription:
I was 2 maybe 3 years old standing in the street address 1720 saunders crescent ann arbor michigan, circa 1960, 1961 col. james mcdivitt lived for a short time across the street and 2 doors down it was his house that the craft flew over. behold project blue book and j. allen hynek. the federal law that states: it is against the law to speak to or interact with an et was enacted on 07/16/69... on 07/20/58 neil armstrong stepped on the moon which also happens to be my birthday i was 11 then. that law was revised when i arrived in eureka ca in 2013. connect the dots. i have lawyers woods and woods in evansville ind. physicals, 5 mri's, xrays, blood tests, dna tests, and the experiences of my life as proof.
also i am a disabled vet with ms and periphereal neuropathy and possible secondary exposure to agent orange i am currently in veteran housing they will not confirm that i am here so come thru the back door with your research.
content.summary: A project serpo dropoff

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to burn some wood that i cut up earlier that day from an old tree that fell i had a fire going and i seen a starlike object hovering high in the sky and i looked around behind me to see if i seen anymore like that and i seen 2 more just like it one was more closer than the other and brighter i ran back inside and grabbed a little lazer light that shines a red beam i aim it at the object and it started to move awayfrom the beam bouncing all around and this pulsating ball kept circling around the object but faster and all of a sudden it shot that ball of lighttward theground down around some trees and i could see this ball of light moving through the trees up and down and side to side i couldnt tell if it was pulsating or flashing but it was doing something i couldnt see it no more so thee were 2 more thatwere behind me i shine the light at the brightest one and it or i can almost feel like it got mad all ofa sudden i seen these greenish blue planes/jets comming directly above me from my left side and behind me perfectly above thetop of my head and they kept flashing these lights i heard the noise from these planes/jets like a roar from a plane the lights never hitthe ground but i know it felt likethey were taking images of me or something it was a little windy that night butit was clear night it seemed to me these starlike objects just sit and hover like they are overseeing something going on this happens everynight on a clear night the first night i even notice was a couple months ago itflewdirectly above my house and hovered i seen an triangle object almost like a flat black with red pulsating light undr it and 2 white lights behind the redish light and stop above my house and hovered nonoise nonthing and going so slow i dont know how it didnt fall from thesky strange littlethings have happened here since then i cantsay they are related but mygarage light flashes not while were here but like when me and mywife come home and pull into driveway thelights flicker and stop as soon as we pull in and a couple times i hear my name being called outside only in the evening or i hear a weird sound i cant explain it i never heard it before but somehow i know they know i know i always wondered why they say(twinkle twinkle little star how i wonder what you are)
content.summary: Starlike with yellowish/orange ball circling around it pulsating i shine red lazer beam at it

content.detailedDescription: Circle yellow dots. hoovering then some abruptly changing directions. hoovered very high in the sky. very strange and moved not like any plane or air device. lots of strange stuff happining near willow run airport.
content.summary: 6 yellow colored circles hovered above i94 freeway heading west near the ypsilanti exit. some begin to move in strange patterns.

content.detailedDescription: I had just got into my car, when i noticed lights blinking straight up ahead of me, i observef it for about 2 minutes, as it move quickly. at first i thought it was a plane .. but quickly realized how the lights were changing colors really fast from red, white & blue that it was not any plane or helicopter as i didnt hear any sounds coming from it.
content.summary: I intiallly assumed it was a plane but quickly realized it was something else on how the lights blinked first a bright red, then white,  then blue.

content.detailedDescription: Thought this was a star but it looked like a christmas tree concentrated light on tip then 5 or 6 dot lights -  took cell phone pics - looks like star from distance then it reflects one large light source when blown up. i stood still and took a lot of cell photos - the light keeps changing shape. looked like it was stationary or hovering when i watched but when i stood still it looked like there was some slight movement. i am on flight path to kennedy airport. curious if airline pilots coming in for a landing from the north shore of li noticed this light configuration. satellite?
content.summary: Saw strange grouping of lights in sky tonight in south-southwest quadrant of sky. around 11:30,

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of april 15th 2016 i was walking to my basement when i looked out my front window to the south and noticed a strange glowing orange light in the sky to the south.  i stopped and watched for a few moments then put on my jacket and went outside to get a better look.  after watching for a few minutes it dissappeard then reappeard but this time it looked like it broke into three other orange orbs then four or five were noticed.  i then called for my family to come outside and look at the lights in the sky, they too whitnessed the lights.  these lights would slowly float around for a minute or so then dissappear but sometimes reappear a mile or so away more to the south east sometimes.  this went on for about 25 minutes or so.

thanks
content.summary: Several orange lights were observed by my family that would disappear then reappear

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling east on rt.52,in florida at 5:45 am. just east of zephier hills florida. i saw a very bright light at about 80°high in the night sky, it hovered up there for a few seconds, then suddenly it went straight down to the other side of the tree line.  i know that we don't have anything that can move that fast. and the angle of descent was not that of a asteroid.
content.summary: Saw bright light in front of me at about 80°up in sky,sudenly it droped straight down below the tree line very very fast.I know er dont have any thing that moves that fast..

content.detailedDescription:
My father frequently observes flashes above his home in gembrook, when i lived there i often observed random lights moving high in the atmosphere in irregular patterns.
many times we observed lights speed down, increasing in size then speed off.
this photo is a 30 second exposure where he has captured something in one of these flashes. 
he reports that he felt scared when he viewed the image.
i had many dreams or experiences of out of body sensations and small shrouded beings in my room while i was paralysed when i lived there.
i have also included an image where i have enhanced the levels in photoshop and circled a few other repeating shapes. if you look you will also see more repeating shapes in other directions which show that it is not camera movement causing these perturbations.
content.summary: Observation of random flashes was captured in 30 second exposure

content.detailedDescription: In approx. 1965, i was a student at a university in richmond virginia. a close friend and i decided to take a ride on rt. 460 on a sunny and warm day, leaving richmond and traveling west. after an hour or so, we began to return to richmond on the same highway, now traveling east. i was in passenger seat and we chatted as my friend drove. i noticed the sun through the windshield - it was up fairly high, almost touching/being framed by the top edge of the windshield on my side of the car. as we chatted, i noticed the sun seemed to be growing larger - gradually. we continued chatting while i took a glance at the sun every once in a while. it was definitely growing larger. my friend noticed also and we stopped chatting as our attention was now riveted on the sun. very gradually - maybe as long as 15 - 30 minutes it grew in size until it almost filled the top portion of our view through the windshield. the color changed from yellow (like the sun) to orange. the shape changed from round to oval - a very elongated oval. there was no sound and the object hovered in the sky. it was bright and gently glowing. there were no details of any kind on the shape - it was uniformly orange and softly glowing throughout. i said to my friend, "what is that?" and she responded "i don't know" we were mesmerized. i felt apprehension but not fear. the strangeness of it was compelling. there is missing time and missing memories because the next thing that i can recall is that the orb was gone and we were still in the car, driving, but almost back in richmond.
content.summary: An object that initially looked like the sun, grew to enormous size, became orange, and became an elongated oval.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette like i normally do and just looking up at the sky as i normally do. on april 12th a "green light the size of a whale" fell from the sky and landed north of me in bantam lake ct. authorities (local) never recovered anything. it was then just a few nights ago around 8:51pm that i witnessed 4 black helicopters which seemed to be in night stalker formation flying north northeast of me at extremely low altitudes, barely above the trees with all of their lights off minus the head helicopter which had one lead light on. the following morning i then witnessed what looked to be an unmarked military cargo plane at low altitudes heading south-southwest from the same location the helicopters were heading to the night before. now tonight, only a day after this cargo plane ordeal here i am, writing this because i just witnessed what i can best explain as a mortal kombat green fireball gliding slowly down into what seemed to be ball pond. i hopped in my car and drove around but could not find any evidence of anything having crashed however the pond itself seemed to have ripples in the pond and an odd steamy fog to it.
content.summary: Giant green fireball gliding to the ground with very short to no tail, more of a glowing fireball

content.detailedDescription: I have an unobstructed view of the area i observe at 930 4/14/2016 a bundle of lights in the direction of a straight path no rigid or defined shape. watched with 750 binoculars and naked eye smooth glide path no sound no other traffic waterford a good 3 to 4 minutes before it faded into horizon
content.summary: Observed object in straight path study speed no rigid or defining shape no metallic sheen lights sporadic. no definite pattern watched till it disappeared in horizon toward rising sun maryland

content.detailedDescription: Looking into the sky at a friends house i noticed what looked to be the lights of a plane in the sky, which at first i didn't give another thought, but soon noticed that it had not moved from that same spot the whole time.  my girlfriend and i both saw it.  i came back home and could still see it in the sky, even my father saw it.
content.summary: Different colored flashing lights in the sky i thought at first was a plane but did not move.

content.detailedDescription: Star like object flashing very bright.  went red, bright green, to white some times blue. stationary in sky but slowing moving to the west.  the moon and stars were not moving as fast as this flashing object.  was very bright and the farther it moved away the less bright.  could not be star moving to fast.  watched for half hour.  not a plane i know what they look like.  i see planes every day.  i am on the flight path to midway and ohare airport.  a few planes in sky when i saw object.  not sure what it was.  not sure if planets track that fast in the sky.   was very bright and pulsating with colors.
content.summary: Red, green, white flashing star like

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back deck looking at the moon around 4:25 pm as it was visible in the sky at the time as there were no clouds in the sky at the time. so as the moon as reference i saw three objects in what looked to me like a decent rotating and also spinning around each other. two of them spinning at the same rate for a few seconds and one of them switching color from white chomeish. to a solid copper like gold color for a split second at a different rotation than the two others. then i grabbed my camera and captured all three changing direction and rapidly accelerating and decelerating away from each other and also flickering light. i have it on video.  slow the video down around 118 to 120. than 53 sec to 54 and i'm sure you'll find more slowing the footing down as i'm still finding more myself in the video.
content.summary: I saw three objects flickering and also spinning around each other and they made a decent and rapid direction change. i have it on video

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on our back deck about 10:40 pm, my wife, son and i were commenting on the visible planets and stars in the night sky. one "star"; which was extremely bright with a predominance of red was noticed low in the sw sky about 15 degrees above the horizon. we thought it might be mars; however, we noticed it appeared to be flashing mainly red lights. we then surmised it was an airplane; however, it did not track across the sky as we commonly see aircraft do in this area. we thought it might be a helicopter, however it remained what appeared to be motionless in the sky for over 20 minutes and there were no noises to be heard. we watched it for over a half-hour with binoculars. during the first 20 minutes, the object did not appear to move. with a naked eye, we could see mainly red, green, and white lights. through the binoculars we could see what looked like mostly bright white lights that looked to have other colored lights randomly flashing on and off. the object flashed multiple and different lights including green, red, blue, violet, and yellow, the dominant lights were red and bright white. the brightness and clarity of the lights was uncanny - not blurry, but very vivid; much like led christmas tree lights. we did see an airplane pass over us moving from se to nw during this time (we routinely see jet aircraft leaving and approaching pit which is about 30 miles away). the object looked to be a long way off (miles?) and was moving slowly to the west. the movement did not appear to be in a straight line, it eventually disappeared over the ridge line to our west after having traversed an arc of about 30 degrees moving from the sw towards the west before we lost sight. the distance of the object was so great that taking, or attempting to take a photo or video would have simply created a photo of what what have looked like another star in the sky - we simply didn't bother.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Extremely bright, almost pinpoints of pulsating red, blue, violet, yellow, and geen lights
